name: Wild Bill
descriptions: Wild Bill is a dead slave found in the Pitt's steelyard in 2277.
Wild Bill and Milly were extremely close friends, having worked together in the mill for some time.

After Wild Billâ€™s disappearance, Milly became dedicated to finding out the whereabouts of her friend, though she cautions any volunteers to be careful, as Bill would have never forgiven himself if someone else got hurt while looking for him.
Wild Bill developed a keen relationship with a fellow slave Milly, as their time in the mill together was a sort of bonding experience.
Wild Bill appears only in The Pitt add-on for Fallout 3.
Wild Bill is a reference to Wild Bill Hickok, an iconic figure from the American Old West period.
